text: Ke ngoko Sinenze nasisizwe esiphakathi (esilungeleleneyo, esizinzileyo) khon’ukuze nibe ngamangqina phezu koluntu, yena uMthunywa abe lingqina phezu kwenu. Kananjalo i’Kiblah57 ebenikade nijongisa kuyo Siyenzele ukuvavanya abo balandela uMthunywa58 (babonakale) kwabo bajibilikayo. Inene (olo vavanyo) lube nzima ngaphandle kwabo uAllâh Abakhokelele eNdleleni. Kwaye uAllâh Asokuze Enze izenzo zenu zingabi nto yanto. Inene uAllâh Unobubele, nguSozinceba woluntu
